channel.title: Frustrated
channel.description: I have had servers online before. This is my first 718 and for some reason it is giving me a bit of trouble. I have my no-ip set up and I have my port opened via utorrent. Canyouseeme confirms that the port is infact open. I changed the ip in loader.java as well as used the forwarded port. It all has been compiled many times it just wont go online. When I run the server, the run works, however, when I go to run the client, it tells me invalid game host. Help ? :O

item.title: Frustrated
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Correct me if i’m wrong, but don’t you have to change the IP in more than one place?(client sided)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @itsconnor itsconnor
item.description:
@itsconnor wrote:

can someone teamview me? http://s269.photobucket.com/user/Justin_Crash_Jacobs/media/Untitled_zpsb92db2f8.jpg.html this is the current error im getting. As said before, port is shown as open, firewall exceptions added, no-ip set up etc, could use some help

Read full topic

item.title: Frustrated
item.dc:creator: @itsconnor itsconnor
item.description:
@itsconnor wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:6, topic:542004”][quote author=itsconnor link=topic=660877.msg4418174#msg4418174 date=1397000106]

Odds are you haven’t portforwarded properly.

Considering the no-ip client is running and multiple port checker website say the port its open, how could this be possible
[/quote]Uh, your client’s ip must be wrong.[/quote]
I checked it, its listed as my no-ip :o

Read full topic

item.title: Frustrated
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

If you have portforwarded as you stated you did, chances are you have just made a small mistake somewhere. The only recommendation I can give is to double check everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Frustrated
item.dc:creator: @itsconnor itsconnor
item.description:
@itsconnor wrote:

I have had servers online before. This is my first 718 and for some reason it is giving me a bit of trouble. I have my no-ip set up and I have my port opened via utorrent. Canyouseeme confirms that the port is infact open. I changed the ip in loader.java as well as used the forwarded port. It all has been compiled many times it just wont go online. When I run the server, the run works, however, when I go to run the client, it tells me invalid game host. Help ?

Read full topic
